action.action-desc: Mr. Obernolte (for himself, Mr. Steube, Mr. Pfluger, and Mr. Crawford) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to allow an owner of a trade secret redress of the theft of trade secrets extraterritorially, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protect American Trade Secrets Act of 2023.

section.header: Redress of theft of trade secrets extraterritorially
section.text: Section 1836 of title 18, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:

subsection.header: Applicability to conduct outside United States
subsection.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, this section shall apply to conduct occurring outside the United States and impacting United States commerce, including conduct by an offender who isâ€”

paragraph.text: not a United States person or an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence into the United States; or
an organization which is created or organized under the laws of a foreign government or which has its principal place of business located outside of the United States.
